mapper.select: SELECT REG_DATE, ST_NAME, STATUS, FINAL_DATE FROM ( SELECT RA.REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, IA.ST_NAME AS ST_NAME, UU.USER_ID AS REPORTEDUSERID, CASE WHEN RA.ADMIN_READ_DATE IS NULL THEN '미확인' WHEN RA.ADMIN_READ_DATE IS NOT NULL AND RP.FINAL_DATE IS NULL THEN '처리중' ELSE '처리완료' END AS STATUS , RP.FINAL_DATE AS FINAL_DATE ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RA.REG_DATE DESC) AS RNUM FROM REP_APPLY RA JOIN RV_BOX RB ON RA.RV_NUM = RB.RV_NUM JOIN ST_LIST SL ON RB.ST_NUM = SL.ST_NUM JOIN IN_PROCESS IP ON SL.IN_PROCESS_NUM = IP.IN_PROCESS_NUM JOIN IN_APPLY IA ON IP.IN_APPLY_NUM = IA.IN_APPLY_NUM JOIN USER_LIST UL ON RB.USER_NUM = UL.USER_NUM JOIN USING_USER UU ON UL.USER_NUM = UU.USER_NUM JOIN REP_PROCESS RP ON RA.REP_APPLY_NUM = RP.REP_APPLY_NUM WHERE RA.USER_NUM = #{user_num} ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
